scripts.say: I send Shion to the Resistance base, place a taunt counter on Purity, and end my turn.
Eh?! Me?! Wait a sec! Why am I being forced to be the tank?!
As expected from someone who usually plays games, you've already picked up on the rules.
But how's this? The field spell, "Sea of Lava," taps Purity with its effect! I also use Mirror Sea's National Power 4 to activate "Siren Technology: Mass Production!"
On top of that, I use "Coin" to discard two 1 mana cost "Mass Production Model"s, and fulfilling the cost for Star and Moon, I increase my Link rating to 3.
I don't really get it, but you've been the only one playing since we started!
Solitaire is a developer's privilege! Return to me, Yamada Hermione, Kakitsubata Nakiri, and Miokawa Iiyo!
I see... with this, I completely understand the combo! Arise, my vanguard, "Archangel Aqua!" Ignition Overdrive!
Aqua! Watch out! Fauxbuki still has one evolution left!
Is this possibly Hololive's trump card...!
You're too late! Due to the damage, burst activates, "The Great Detective Fubuki's Riddle!"
I sacrifice all of my "pieces" and banish them from the game! With this, I summon my strongest servant!
Come out, the ultimate form of Shirakami Fubuki, ruler of time and space, Shadow Eye Blizzard Fox!
That isn't a monster... That's Fubuki!
I just have to defeat your Fubuki in order to win! Now, you would do well to bow before the most noble power in the entire Hololive Headquarters!
... I wouldn't be so sure about that.
Fubuki, you're still standing...? But how...?
Quick-Play Spell Activated! I fuse the furniture "Secret Magic Booster" with myself!
This effect can only be activated in another world! It nullifies one direct attack from the opponent, and reflects it back at them!
You're saying that it's an effect that's not written on the card, but... a hidden effect?!
Th-That... There's no way...! Gahh!
Did the enemy just faint from Kawakaze's silently striking her with the back of her sword?
The mysterious space has dissipated... W-We've won... right?
For some reason, I'm tired out... Let's hurry to the Hololive headquarters...
